revised_title: The Impact of Sexual Harassment on Female Guppy Foraging
tldr: This study found that sexual harassment from male guppies led to a 25% decrease in foraging time for females. The presence of additional females and males in the environment increased aggression and reduced feeding bouts. The lost feeding time could have significant fitness consequences for female guppies, as reduced food intake can affect their fecundity.
